1. 12 nights’ accommodation on twin or triple sharing bases in standard hotels / tents / camps with neat & tidy rooms and western wash rooms. All tent accommodation will be in Swiss camps with  western wash rooms. Accommodation starts from night stay on Day 01 at Chandigarh till night stay on Day 12 in Pathankot.
  2. Meals on MAP plan, 2 meals (Breakfast & Dinner) at eating joints on the way & may not be in major towns where people prefer to have platters according to their personal tastes. From breakfast on Day 01 at Chandigarh till breakfast on Day 12 in Pathankot.

  5. Tour Manager to manage the group by taking all safety measures. The group has to follow her/ him to make the tour a success.
  6. Well experienced and skilled Royal Enfield Mechanic with spare parts and tools. They are well trained to handle large groups. The mechanic will be in the backing car.
  7. The spare parts, engine oil used on the way or any damages to the bike on the tour is chargeable.
  8. Backing vehicle – a 4 wheel drive (Xylo/Innova) car for manager, mechanical and medical support. Electronic items like cameras, laptops can be kept in the car.
  9. Basic first Aid Kit & Oxygen cylinders. It’s advised that one should bring his/her own prescribed medicines.
